title: Djokovic ’blessed’ to record 100th Wimbledon win
byline: Seven-time champion Novak Djokovic said he is ’’blessed’’ to have sealed his 100th victory at Wimbledon with a statement third-round win over compatriot Miomir Kecmanovic.

title: Bangladesh hold nerve to level ODI series with Sri Lanka
byline: Bangladesh held their nerve in a nail-biting finish to clinch a 16-run win over Sri Lanka in the second ODI at Colombo on Saturday, squaring the three-match series at 1-1.

title: SLC felicitates Ruchira Palliyaguruge for officiating in 100 ODIs
byline: Sri Lanka Cricket felicitated Ruchira Palliyaguruge, who is officiating in his 100th ODI as an on-field umpire during today’s game.

title: Djokovic 'blessed' to record 100th Wimbledon win
byline: Seven-time champion Novak Djokovic said he is ’’blessed’’ to have sealed his 100th victory at Wimbledon with a statement third-round win over compatriot Miomir Kecmanovic.

title: Bangladesh ring in changes for Sri Lanka T20I series
byline: Five changes have been named with the big one being the omission of Najmul Hossain Shanto.

title: Search for survivors continues as Texas floods kill 43, including 15 children
byline: Hundreds of rescuers have been deployed to search for survivors in central Texas, after flash floods killed 43 people, including 15 children.

title: Four nabbed at BIA for smuggling whiskey, cardamom worth Rs. 15 million
byline: Four Sri Lankan passengers were arrested by Customs officers at the  Bandaranaike International Airport (BIA) this morning while attempting to smuggle in a large consignment of whiskey and cardamom valued at approximately Rs. 15 million.

title: Three including child injured in Kosgama shooting
byline: Three people, including a 12-year-old girl, were injured in a shooting incident at Suduwella, Kosgama, early this morning (6), police said.

title: Special traffic plan in Borella for Cardinal’s 50th jubilee ceremony
byline: Special traffic arrangements will be in place in Borella tomorrow evening in view an event commemorating the 50th priestly jubilee of His Holiness the Cardinal.

title: Musk announces forming of ’America Party’ in further break from Trump
byline: The tattered bromance between Republican President Donald Trump and his main campaign financier Elon Musk took another fractious turn on Saturday when the space and automotive billionaire announced the formation of a new political party, saying Trump’s ’’big, beautiful’’ tax bill would bankrupt America.

title: e-Revenue Licence system temporarily unavailable
byline: The Information and Communication Technology Agency of Sri Lanka (ICTA) said the electronic Revenue Licence system (eRL 2.0) is currently unavailable due to a critical technical infrastructure issue.

title: Former Eastern Provincial Councillor ‘Iniya Barathi’ arrested by CID
byline: Former Eastern Provincial Councillor K. Pushpakumar, also known as ‘Iniya Barathi’ and an associate of ‘Pillayan’, has been arrested by the Criminal Investigation Department (CID).

title: Matthew Duckworth appointed Australia’s new High Commissioner to Sri Lanka
byline: Australia’s Foreign Affairs Minister, Penny Wong, has announced the appointment of Matthew Duckworth as the country’s next High Commissioner to Sri Lanka.

title: 457 arrested in special  operation in Southern Province
byline: A total of 457 individuals were arrested during a special search operation conducted across the Galle, Matara and Elpitiya police areas in the Southern Province.

title: Musk announces forming of ’America Party’ in further break from Trump
byline: The tattered bromance between Republican President Donald Trump and his main campaign financier Elon Musk took another fractious turn on Saturday when the space and automotive billionaire announced the formation of a new political party, saying Trump’s ’’big, beautiful’’ tax bill would bankrupt America.

title: Search for survivors continues as Texas floods kill 43, including 15 children
byline: Hundreds of rescuers have been deployed to search for survivors in central Texas, after flash floods killed 43 people, including 15 children.

title: Three children drown in Vakarai tank
byline: Three children were reported drowned while bathing in the Kariappan Kirni tank in Vakarai, police said.

title: Northern line trains to operate daily from tomorrow
byline: The Sri Lanka Railways Department has announced that the intercity express train operating on the Northern Line during weekends will now run daily starting tomorrow (July 7), following numerous requests from commuters.

title: Indian firms looking to expand abroad have good chance in Sri Lanka: ITC chief
byline: Indian companies looking to expand abroad have a good chance in Sri Lanka due to the island nation’s proximity, ITC Group Chief Executive Sanjiv Puri said.

title: Uganda’s 80-year-old president in bid to extend 40-year rule
byline: Uganda’s long-serving president, Yoweri Museveni, 80, has been declared the governing party’s candidate in next year’s presidential election, opening the way for him to seek to extend his nearly 40 years in power.
